name: ToxoplasmosisTestsForToxoplasmaGondiiIgGAntibody
title: Toxoplasmosis (Tests for Toxoplasma gondii IgG Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Toxoplasma gondii IgG Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Toxoplasma gondii IgG Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
